xwikidoc.name: ApplicationObjects
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: ApplicationObjects
xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} #if($request.docFullName && $xwiki.exists($request.docFullName) && $request.className && $request.number) #set($Integer = 0) #set($requestedObj = $xwiki.getDocument($request.docFullName).getObject($request.className, $Integer.parseInt($request.number))) #set($requestedClassProperties = $xwiki.getClass($request.className).properties) #if($requestedObj.getProperty('name').value) #set($objectTitleAdd = "- ${requestedObj.getProperty('name').value} ") #end (% class="editorObjectTitle" data-classname="$request.className" data-number="$request.number" %)(((==== {{html}}{{/html}} $request.className - $request.number $!objectTitleAdd====#if(!$request.selectedObject)[[image:icon:cross||title='$services.localization.render('webide.objects.buttons.remove')' data-classname='$request.className' data-number='$request.number' class='editorRemoveObject']]#end))) (% id="editorObject-${request.className}-${request.number}" class="editorObjectDetails xobject" %)((( #foreach($prop in $requestedClassProperties) #if(!$request.selectedObject) (% class="editorPropertyLabel" %)((( $prop.prettyName ))) $requestedObj.display($prop.name, 'edit') #elseif($prop.name == 'code' || ($prop.name == 'content')) (% class="editorCodeField" %)((( $requestedObj.display($prop.name, 'edit') ))) #else (% class="editorPropertyLabel"%)((( $prop.prettyName ))) $requestedObj.display($prop.name, 'edit') #end #end #elseif($request.allClasses) {{html clean=false}} $services.localization.render('webide.objects.addLabel'): {{/html}} #elseif($request.addObject && $request.docFullName) #set($requestedDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($request.docFullName)) #if($request.isGlobal) #set($requestedObj = $requestedDoc.newObject($request.addObject)) #set($ok = $requestedObj.set('use', 'always')) #set($ok = $requestedObj.set('visibility', 'Current Wiki')) #end #if($request.properties) #set($jsonProp = $jsontool.parse($util.decodeURI($request.properties))) #if(!$requestedObj) #set($requestedObj = $requestedDoc.newObject($request.addObject)) #end #set($jsonProp = $jsontool.parse($util.decodeURI($request.properties))) #foreach($key in $jsonProp.keySet()) #set($ok = $requestedObj.set($key, $jsonProp.get($key))) #end #else #if(!$requestedObj) #set($requestedObj = $requestedDoc.newObject($request.addObject)) #end #end #set($discard = $requestedDoc.save()) #set($requestedClassProperties = $xwiki.getClass($request.addObject).properties) (% class="editorObjectTitle" data-classname="$request.addObject" data-number="$requestedObj.number" %)(((==== $request.addObject - $requestedObj.number ====#if(!$request.selectedObject)[[image:icon:cross||title='$services.localization.render('webide.objects.buttons.remove')' data-classname='$request.addObject' data-number='$requestedObj.number' class='editorRemoveObject']]#end))) (% id="editorObject-${request.addObject}-${requestedObj.number}" class="editorObjectDetails xobject" %)((( #foreach($prop in $requestedClassProperties) (% class="editorPropertyLabel" %)((( $prop.prettyName ))) $requestedObj.display($prop.name, 'edit') #end ))) #elseif($request.updateToken) #set($requestedDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($request.docFullName)) (% id="currentToken" %)((($services.csrf.getToken()))) #elseif($request.removePage) #set($pageReference = $services.model.createDocumentReference('', $request.docSpace, $request.docPage)) #set($pageDoc = $xwiki.getDocument($pageReference)) #set($ok = $pageDoc.delete()) #end {{/velocity}}
